headline: The Smartest Dividend Stocks to Buy With $5,000 Right Now
summary: Parker-Hannifin is an engineering company specializing in motion and control technologies that has paid dividends for 300 consecutive quarters.  W.W. Grainger is a global distributor of industrial maintenance products that has consistently grown its revenue, net income, and free cash flows over the years.  Procter & Gamble is a consumer goods behemoth that has raised its dividends for 69 consecutive years.

headline: P&G aims for resiliency with supply chain redesign
summary: The initiative, which will include right-sizing production and discontinuing some brands, is expected to yield $1.5 billion in annual savings.
